00025 // Snap: integer division that rounds the result to the nearest integer
00026 template<class Integer>
00027 inline Integer idiv(Integer a, Integer b)
00028 {
00029       return a > 0 ? b > 0 ? (a + b/2) / b : (a - b/2) / b :
00030                            b > 0 ? (a - b/2) / b : (a + b/2) / b ;
00031 }
